content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn how to talk about your hobbies and ask others about theirs. This is a great way to get to know people!

data.tip: The 'u' sound in French is made with rounded lips, like you're about to whistle.

content.title: Sharing Your Hobbies
content.setting: You're at a social event, and someone named Alex strikes up a conversation.

conversation_flow.title: Mention a sport you enjoy
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Salut ! Moi c'est Alex. Qu'est-ce que tu aimes faire ?

conversation_flow.title: Mention another activity you do
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah, super ! Et tu aimes faire autre chose ?

conversation_flow.title: Say how often you do one of your hobbies

content.text: To say you *don't* like something, you wrap 'ne' and 'pas' around the verb. For example, 'J'aime' becomes 'Je n'aime pas'.
To talk about the near future, use the verb 'aller' (to go) + another verb. It's like saying 'I am going to...' in English.

content.title: Giving More Detail
content.setting: Alex is interested and asks for more details about your hobbies.

conversation_flow.title: Explain why you like your hobby
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ah d'accord. Et pourquoi tu aimes la lecture ?

conversation_flow.title: Mention something you don't like to do
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Je comprends. Il y a une activité que tu n'aimes pas ?

conversation_flow.title: Say what you plan to do this weekend
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: D'accord. Et qu'est-ce que tu vas faire ce week-end ?

content.text: A simple way to ask the same question back to someone is to say 'Et toi ?', which means 'And you?'.

data.tip: This is a pure 'oo' sound, like in the English word 'shoe'. Make your lips into a small circle.

content.title: Showing Interest in Their Hobbies
content.setting: Now it's your turn to ask Alex about what they like to do.

conversation_flow.title: Ask what they like to do
Ask a follow-up question about their hobby
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Bonne question ! Moi, j'aime la photographie.

conversation_flow.title: Express that you find their hobby interesting
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Je fais des photos dans le parc.
